name: healthcare
description: To make it easy for you to get started with GitLab, here's a list of recommended next steps.

scripts.build:linux: cd ./frontend && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf ../backend/dist && cp -r dist ../backend/
scripts.build:win: cd .\frontend && npm install && npm run build && if exist ..\backend\dist rmdir /s /q ..\backend\dist && xcopy /e /i /y dist ..\backend\dist && cd  .\backend && npm install
scripts.build: if exist /C/Windows (npm run build:win) else (npm run build:linux)
scripts.build:new: npm run build:linux && npm run build:backend
